name: George Spence
summary: George Spence - Data Engineer @ Hexegic | MChem(Hons)

experiences: In the first 6 months, saved over 30 FTEs for the customer by automating repetitive dataset ingestion processes and producing front-end dashboards to support operational analysis and planning, leading to my promotion to deputy team lead.
Responsible for managing the technical business of the team, mentoring other team members and approving peer reviews.
Features deployed include: optimised data pipelines using PySpark and Pandas, complex relational ontologies to represent real world data models and responsive front-end applications using TypeScript.
Developed a data uploader library for processing multiple file types with varying schemas by implementing upload config versioning and custom data health checks.

work_experience.company: Defence Science and Technology Laboratories - MOD
experiences: Shaped requirements and managed international extra-mural project with US research lab to evaluate chemical sensor performance for UK government.
Worked on robotics and autonomy research including supporting large scale trials and workshops, drafting funding proposals and completing fundamental research.
Developed cutting-edge test and evaluation systems, including hardware and SCADA/HMI software to characterise chemical sensors for UK MOD procurement.
Processing and visualised data in Python (Pandas, Matplotlib) for chemical sensor analysis, to generate impactful insights for stakeholders.
Delivered training to military delegates, communicating specialist CBRN knowledge and supporting training scenarios in operationally relevant contexts.
Worked on three pharmaceutical research projects with both external and in house clients for a global contract research organisation.
Was responsible for the chemical synthesis of a novel series of antibiotic candidates and achieved a 50-fold increase in biochemical potency of the drug candidate.

data_engineering: PySpark, Pandas, Data Pipelines, ETL, Data Modelling
